document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON APPROVING AN AMENDMENT TO BROADWAY DISTRICT SPECIFIC PLAN TABLE 2-3 TO PERMIT LODGING AS A CONDITIONALLY PERMITTED USE IN THE LOCAL-SERVING MIXED-USE (LSMU} ZONING DISTRICT AND ADDING A NEW SPECIAL DEVELOPMENT REQUIREMENT NO. 3 TO REQUIRE LODGING USES IN THE LSMU ZONING DISTRICT QUALIFY FOR A THREE STAR OR HIGHER FORBES TRAVEL GUIDE RATING (FILE NO. PL20-0030}
